```{shinylive-r}
#| standalone: true
#| viewerHeight: 800

library(shiny)

ui <- fluidPage(
  sidebarLayout(
    sidebarPanel(
      fileInput("file_upload", "Step 1: Choose a CSV file", accept = ".csv")
    ),
    mainPanel(
      div(
        style = "overflow-x:auto; overflow-y:auto; max-height:650px;",
        tableOutput("main_table")
      )
    )
  )
)

server <- function(input, output, session) {
  output$main_table <- renderTable({
    req(input$file_upload)
    read.csv(input$file_upload$datapath) |> head()
  })
}

shinyApp(ui, server)
```
